General.Name: Avrupa Yatirim Holding AS
General.Description: Avrupa Yatirim Holding A.S. provides healthcare and telecommunication services. The company operates, equips, and leases private hospitals, medical centers, dialysis centers, medical analysis and x-ray laboratories, and other healthcare facilities. It also purchases, hires, owns, sells, transfers, and leases communication equipment comprising telephone, telex, and fax; and invests in domestic and foreign companies. The company was formerly known as Baysan Trafo Radyatorleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. and changed its name to Avrupa Yatirim Holding A.S. in December 2014. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Avrupa Yatirim Holding A.S. is a subsidiary of Alsancak Saglik Hizm. Tic. A.S.
General.Address: Levent Mahallesi Gazeteciler Sit, Istanbul, Turkey
